mapper.insert: insert into board (member, start_date, end_date, title, content, region, file_name, file_path, festival_category) values (#{member}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{title}, #{content}, #{region}, #{file_name}, #{file_path}, #{festival_category})
mapper.select: select * from board where end_date >= sysdate order by start_date, end_date fetch first 10 rows only

select rownum as rank, idx, start_date, end_date, title, favorites, grade, region, file_name, file_path, festival_category from board where end_date >= sysdate order by favorites desc fetch first 10 rows only
select * from board order by idx desc offset #{offset} rows fetch next #{per_page} rows only
